mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to empower professionals and simplify the way people find trusted services in Azerbaijan. We believe in creating opportunities, building trust, and fostering a community where quality work is recognized and rewarded.

trust.title: Trust & Safety

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Task.az was founded with a simple vision: to make it easy for people in Azerbaijan to find and hire skilled professionals for any task. We saw the challenges that both clients and professionals faced in connecting with each other, and we knew there had to be a better way.
story.paragraph2: Starting in 2025, we've grown from a small team with a big idea to Azerbaijan's leading service marketplace. Today, thousands of professionals use our platform to showcase their skills and build their businesses, while clients find the perfect match for their projects.
story.paragraph3: What sets us apart is our commitment to the local market. We understand the unique needs of Azerbaijan's service economy and have built features specifically designed for our community. From secure payment processing to verified professional profiles, every aspect of our platform is designed to create trust and facilitate successful collaborations.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Task.az

q1.question: What is Task.az?
q1.answer: Task.az is Azerbaijan's leading platform connecting clients with skilled professionals. Whether you need home repairs, programming, tutoring, or any other service, Task.az helps you find verified professionals quickly and securely.

q2.question: How does Task.az work?
q2.answer: Clients post tasks describing their needs and budget. Professionals then submit proposals to work on these tasks. Clients can review proposals, check professional profiles and ratings, and choose the best match for their project.

q3.question: Is Task.az free to use?
q3.answer: Creating an account and browsing tasks is completely free. We charge a small service fee on completed transactions to maintain and improve our platform.

q4.question: How do I create an account?
q4.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button at the top of the page, fill in your details, and verify your email address. You can then start posting tasks or apply to become a professional.

q5.question: Is my personal information safe?
q5.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your data with third parties without your consent. Read our Privacy Policy for more details.

q1.question: How do I post a task?
q1.answer: After signing in, click 'Post Task' in the navigation menu. Fill in the task details including title, description, budget, and deadline. Once posted, professionals can start submitting proposals.

q2.question: How do I choose the right professional?
q2.answer: Review each professional's profile, including their ratings, completed jobs, skills, and portfolio. Read reviews from previous clients. You can also communicate with professionals before hiring to ensure they're the right fit.

q3.question: How does payment work?
q3.answer: We use a secure dual-confirmation payment system. Payment is held securely until both you and the professional confirm the work is completed satisfactorily. This protects both parties.

q4.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the work?
q4.answer: Communication is key. First, discuss any issues with the professional. If you can't resolve it, contact our support team. We're here to mediate and ensure fair outcomes for all users.

q5.question: Can I edit or cancel a task after posting?
q5.answer: Yes, you can edit task details before any professional starts working. If you need to cancel, do so as early as possible and communicate with any professionals who have submitted proposals.

q1.question: How do I become a professional on Task.az?
q1.answer: Sign in to your account and visit the 'Become a Professional' page. Fill out your profile with details about your skills, experience, and portfolio. Once approved, you can start applying to tasks.

q2.question: How do I find tasks to work on?
q2.answer: Browse available tasks in your area of expertise. Use filters to find tasks that match your skills and location. You can also set up notifications for new tasks in specific categories.

q3.question: How do I get paid?
q3.answer: After completing a task, both you and the client confirm completion. The payment is then released to your account. You can withdraw funds to your bank account according to our payment schedule.

q4.question: What fees does Task.az charge?
q4.answer: We charge a service fee on completed transactions. The exact percentage depends on your account level and transaction volume. Higher-rated professionals with more completed jobs enjoy lower fees.

q5.question: How can I improve my profile and get more work?
q5.answer: Complete your profile fully with skills, portfolio, and professional photos. Deliver quality work to earn 5-star ratings. Respond quickly to clients and maintain good communication. Build a strong reputation through excellent service.
